channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: More rubbish in Albion Grove, 30th October
item.description:
Pretty self explanatory. This walking alley is treated poorly, which is a shame as kids walk there every day.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Albion Grove, Hackney, London

item.title: Leafs, 30th October
item.description:
Dear council, you closed my report with "fixed" resolution but the issue is still ongoing as you can see on the attached photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entire street, 30th October
item.description:
For several weeks Georgiana Street underwent extremely noisy and disruptive roadworks. Literally within days of that finishing the exact same section of road is being dug up again. Why are we being made to suffer months of extreme noise pollution and disruption due to poor planning? When is this road going to undergo yet more works as part of preventing traffic from going all the way along it?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Georgiana Street, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
